QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Terokkar Forest!
QuestData.Description: We have lost contact with the druids of the Cenarion Thicket$B$BThe King has commanded any able bodies of the Alliance to venture into Terokkar Forest and discover what has happened.$b$bThe thicket can be found by heading northwest through Terokkar Forest from Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with one of the druids at the Cenarion Thicket in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad that Stonebreaker Hold sent you. The druids of the thicket have been slain! Only myself and one other have survived, and he's insane.$B$BI don't know what happened, but I intend to get to the bottom of it. Whatever it was, it happened quickly and feels unnatural.$B$BWill you help me?
